Content.Text:
<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is a very special day. Do you know why?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today, a new life has been born. Let's hurry to
the barn. I can't wait to see it myself!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How adorable! Have you thought of a name for it
yet?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That is the perfect name! Now, you'll need to
take good care of it. Raise it well, okay?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you'll excuse me, then, my never-ending sea
of work awaits...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today, a new chick has hatched. Let's hurry to
the coop. I can't wait to see it myself!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please think of a name for it.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yes, that didn't quite have the right ring to it. Try
to think of another name.
